upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: umiapʉ cu, puaruma tarʉana umiapʉ pakiaturuana, amihla kapitanʉ tarʉana, “musiri! matitʉnʉlʉ!”
It’s time for class , the teacher walked into the classroom, and the monitor said: “Stand up! Salute!”
我今天七點到學校。: 上課了，老師走進教室，班長說:「起立!敬禮!」

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: piataisa vahliungu mu amihla, “mavacangʉ pakiaturua.”
We said loudly, “Hi, teacher.”
我今天七點到學校。: 我們大聲的說:「老師好。」

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: marumaru maci umiiapʉ, tumututuru pakiaturua ihlahlamu kari tahlana umarucacani.
In class, the teacher taught us the Hla′alua language of numbers.
我今天七點到學校。: 上課的時候，老師教我們數字的族語。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: pialʉvʉ mu pakiaturua, pahlusahli cu a mu sahli umarucacani.
We followed the teacher to read, we sang the number song.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們跟著老師唸，我們唱了數字歌。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: macahlia ku matumuhlu kari tahlana.
I have learned many Hla′alua languages.
我今天七點到學校。: 我學會好多族語。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: ariari ku umaiiapʉ, ariari ku musuturu kari tahlana, tumua ku umahlikua ina’a tumimahla.
I go to school every day, I learn the Hla′alua language every day, and I want to tell my mother.
我今天七點到學校。: 我天天上學，我天天學族語，我要講給媽媽聽。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: ngahla ku pia Caʉpʉ.
My name is Caʉpʉ.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的名字是Caʉpʉ。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: amaku ngahla pia Amahlʉ.
My dad’s name is Amahlʉ.
我今天七點到學校。: 我爸爸的名字是Amahlʉ。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: inaku ngahla pia Inguru.
My mother’s name is Inguru.
我今天七點到學校。: 我媽媽的名字是Inguru。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: maahlʉ ku caihli mamisa.
I am 10 years old.
我今天七點到學校。: 我今年10歲。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: maru ku ahlalua hlahlusa cacihli, pia ʉlʉnganʉ kana’ana, laihla ucani caihli kana’ana mamisa.
I have a brother, his name is ʉlʉnganʉ, he is 11 years old.
我今天七點到學校。: 我有一個哥哥，他叫ʉlʉnganʉ，他今年11歲。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: kikucu a mu ma ariatʉkʉrana umaiiapʉ.
We study in the same school.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們在同一間學校讀書。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: ihlaku nua ahlalua  hlahlusa rianʉ marumuku pahlusahli.
Both my brother and I like to sing.
我今天七點到學校。: 我和哥哥都喜歡唱歌。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: marumuku aku makahlangulu, maru maci taluavaʉlʉ, kiʉlʉsʉ ucani pihlingi a mu musa makahlangulu.
I like swimming. During the holidays, our whole family go swimming together.
我今天七點到學校。: 我喜歡游泳，放假的時候，我們全家會一起去游泳。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: marumuku ku pautuahlangi laʉlaʉvʉ varu’u, acahli a mu pahlulʉsʉ pahlusahli hla makahlangulu.
I love meeting new people, we can sing and swim together.
我今天七點到學校。: 我喜歡認識新朋友，我們可以一起唱歌和游泳。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: mamaini ku tahlana Hla’alua
I am an Hla’alua child.
我今天七點到學校。: 我是拉阿魯哇族的小孩。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: maruaru Rʉhlʉcʉ salia hlamu.
Our family lives in Rʉhlʉcʉ.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們家住在浮萍。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: matarungahlʉ salia hlamu maru cucu’u lalima.
There are five people in our family.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們家共有五個人。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: salia hlamu maru ahlahlalua hlimihlimilavaʉ tatulu.
There are three brothers and sisters in our family.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們家有三個兄弟姊妹。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: miaʉlʉsʉ aku ama’a, ina’a, ahlalua hlahlusa nua ahlalua ahlaina.
I live with my father, mother, brother and sister.
我今天七點到學校。: 我跟爸爸、媽媽、哥哥和姊姊住在一起。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: amaku tam langica, amaku ia ’aumu.
My father is tall and he is a policeman.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的爸爸很高，我的爸爸是警察。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: tam mirihli a inaku, maisasavusavuanʉ inaku.
My mother is thin and my mom is a doctor.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的媽媽很瘦，我的媽媽是醫生。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: ma salia macahlia ama’ana pialʉsʉ a mu masi kari tahlana.
My father speaks the Hla′alua language with us at home.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸在家會和我們說族語。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: taluvaʉlʉ ahlamacicia rianʉ a mu puaili miararuma.
We will all go back to the tribe during the summer vacation.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們暑假都會回部落。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: matialʉsʉ matiasangalʉ ihlaku nua ahlahlalua tamuciakʉ.
My brothers and sisters and I will catch frogs together.
我今天七點到學校。: 我和兄姊會一起抓青蛙。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: tam marumuku a ku cucu salia hlamu.
I like our family very much.
我今天七點到學校。: 我很喜歡我們家的人。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: kipuhlu aku nua ina’a pasaulaula’ʉ arinani.
I went out with my mother today.
我今天七點到學校。: 今天我和媽媽出去玩。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: tam valacuku langica sihlianʉ, kuasarʉmʉ kuacici langica mʉmʉa, tam matahlʉtʉkʉ varatʉna.
The sky is blue during the day, the weather is neither cold nor hot, and the wind is cool.
我今天七點到學校。: 白天的天空很藍，天氣不冷也不熱，風很涼爽。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: mamu ahlahlapa sʉsʉsʉngʉa uumu pangʉ ， hlisahlikua tihla’ahlʉ tahliariana masunguli angatʉ 。
We ate bread on the grass, the sun was shining on us, and it was very warm.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們在草地上吃著麵包，陽光灑在身上，非常溫暖。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: kʉlʉpʉngʉ mahlipapu aratavuhliu cu a langica.
In the afternoon, the sky turned red.
我今天七點到學校。: 下午，天空變紅了。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: pakisuahlai ku ina’a, tiaraisa matavuhliu a langica.
I asked my mother why the sky is red.
我今天七點到學校。: 我問媽媽，為甚麼天空是紅色的。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: amihla ina’a, taiaci’ai mʉcʉkʉhlʉ pariavaratʉ.
Mom said, maybe the typhoon is coming.
我今天七點到學校。: 媽媽說，可能是颱風要來了。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: uka’a lulunga langica ruvana, murumita cu a ’acangʉrahlʉ.
There were no clouds in the sky at night, and the stars came out.
我今天七點到學校。: 晚上天上沒有雲，星星出來了。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: puaili cu a mu salia mʉmʉa.
We were going home too.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們也要回家了。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: puaili salia, sala’a makiniaku ’acangʉrahlʉ ahli’ai.
On the way home, I made a wish with the stars,
我今天七點到學校。: 在回家的路上，我跟星星許願，

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: ahli’ai kuacʉkʉhlʉ a pariavaratʉ, hlutumua ku kipuhlumana pasaulaula’ʉ.
I hope the typhoon doesn't come, I still want to go out to play again.
我今天七點到學校。: 希望颱風不要來，我還想再出去玩。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: ma patʉkʉ salia hlamu ariatʉkʉrana ku, ariari musasala ku mahlukua ariatʉkʉrana, musasala puaili salia mʉmʉa.
My school is next to our house, I walk to school every day, and I also walk home.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的學校在我們家旁邊，我天天走路去學校，也走路回家。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: ku taisa ariatʉkʉrana hlamu, uka’a tumahlaʉ mamaini umaiiapʉ arupautuahlangʉ cucu mʉmʉa.
Our school is not big, there are not many students, everyone knows each other.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們學校不大，沒有很多學生，大家互相認識。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: ma parana sikuatitipa kiakukucu a mamainina, pasaulʉsʉ piataʉhlʉkai, pahlulʉsʉ makakari.
All the children will gather in the playground, play ball and chat together.
我今天七點到學校。: 所有小朋友會聚在操場，一起玩球、一起聊天。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: macahlia pakiaturua pasaulʉsʉ hlamu pasaulaula’ʉ mʉmʉa, ihlaisa ia taisa pihlingi ariatʉkʉrana.
The teachers also play with us, the school is one big family.
我今天七點到學校。: 老師們也會和我們一起玩，學校是個大家庭。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: ariari rianʉ hlamu maivʉtʉraʉ, kiakukucu patapuhlipuhli tarʉana umiapʉ.
We have to clean every day, and everyone has to clean the classroom.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們每天都要打掃，大家要把教室打掃乾淨。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: maru cucu’u sasahli cingarʉ, maru cucu’u maivʉtʉraʉ.
Some people clean the windows, some sweep the floor.
我今天七點到學校。: 有些人去擦窗戶，有些人去掃地。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: maivʉtʉraʉ hlamu aucaucani parana ’aratingi, kiakukucu takulʉsʉ taku’i’iarʉ, tam mahlicungu a ariatʉkʉrana ariari.
We will also clean every corner of the school. Everyone works together, and the school is very clean every day.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們還會打掃學校的各個角落，大家分工合作，學校每天都很乾淨。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: hlimusa ku miararuma takuliliungu tamu hlahlusa kiira
Yesterday, I went to visit my grandpa in the tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 昨天，我去部落拜訪爺爺。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: rahlua cu a mu kuapakita, tam miatatarʉ a ku isana.
We haven’t seen each other for a long time and I miss him a lot.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們很久沒有見面了，我很想念他。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: taratʉahlʉ ku tamu’u hlahlusa, makuakuaisa ihlaku uumu vakatʉ maami , makuakuaisa ihlaku miama sahlumu rahlʉngʉ.
As soon as grandpa saw me, he invited me to eat watermelon and drink tea.
我今天七點到學校。: 爺爺一看到我，就請我吃西瓜，請我喝茶。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: tam maami a hlilʉmʉkʉ isa tamuhlahlusana vakatʉ maami, tamuucu sa’au.
The watermelon grown by grandpa is very sweet and really delicious.
我今天七點到學校。: 爺爺種的西瓜很甜，真的很好吃。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: marumuku a ku tamuhlahlusa isa sahlumu rahlʉngʉ mʉmʉa. tam mavacangʉ miima.
I also like grandpa’s tea, it’s tasted good too.
我今天七點到學校。: 我也喜歡爺爺的茶，也很好喝。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: marumaru maci mahlipapu, pahlaʉlʉsʉ aku nua tamuahlaina avavu kuamamahlipapu.
At noon, I cooked lunch with my grandma.
我今天七點到學校。: 中午的時候，我和奶奶一起煮午餐。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: hlivavu cu tamuahlaina tam marivacangʉ, maru vutukuhlu, maru turukuka, maru vusiakʉ, marumana tavuhlinga.
Grandma cooked a big lunch, including fish, chicken, pumpkin, and snails.
我今天七點到學校。: 奶奶煮了很豐盛的午餐，有魚、有雞、有南瓜、還有蝸牛。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: kualʉpʉngʉ kuamamahlipapu, musa mu tatahlatʉngʉa rumavi hlatʉngʉ.
After lunch, we went to the vegetable garden to pick vegetables.
我今天七點到學校。: 吃完午餐後，我們去菜園摘菜。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: umala tamuahlaina matumuhlu mairangʉ, intavangʉ hla takʉcʉngʉ uvura ihlaku, avura ihlaku mahlava puaili salia.
Grandma brought me a lot of sweet potatoes, taro and buckwheat, and asked me to take them home.
我今天七點到學校。: 奶奶拿了很多地瓜、芋頭和蕗蕎給我，要我帶回家。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: aruparuahlʉamu, amihla arupakita cucuaari.
I said goodbye to them and said I’d see them next time.
我今天七點到學校。: 我跟他們道別，說下次再去看他們。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: ruavici pakiaturua ihlahlamu musa taupangana kulikulikuli’i, ma mu sipangʉhlʉva patavʉhlʉrʉ pu’a cukahlangʉ.
Today the teacher took us to the zoo, and we lined up at the gate to buy tickets.
我今天七點到學校。: 今天老師帶我們去動物園，我們在門口排隊買票。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: mulavaʉ puaruma taupangana kulikulikuli’i amihla pakiaturua, “ahlicuvungana ia ngahlana ahlamʉ, ilikusuna ngahlana vuhli’i, kiakukucu takacicihli kumita.”
After entering the zoo, the teacher said, There are birds in the front and snakes in the back
我今天七點到學校。: so you can visit them yourself.""
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/35629/5: 進入動物園後，老師說:「前面是鳥類，後面是蛇類，大家自己參觀。」

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: muluahlʉ ku vuhli’i, kuhlaisai kuaku kumita ngahlana vuhli’i.
I'm afraid of snakes, so I don't look at snakes.
我今天七點到學校。: 我會怕蛇，所以我不看蛇類。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: taratʉahlʉ cu a ku matumuhlu ahlamʉ, ma ahlahlapa kiu’u miapipihlihli, taratʉahlʉ mana tapʉ’ʉna ma ’isʉngʉrʉ malusapʉ.
I saw a lot of birds flying around in the trees and saw owls sleeping in tree hollows.
我今天七點到學校。: 我看到了很多鳥，他們在樹上飛來飛去，還有看到貓頭鷹在樹洞裡睡覺。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: taupangana kulikulikuli’i maru kalavungu mʉlʉngʉsʉ ngunguru, tarʉmʉcʉ kavahlʉ nua lukuhlu, angahli kiariari kunaku akita kani’i kuli’i, arinani hlikumitacu tamuucu masasangarʉ tʉkʉ.
There are elephants, horses and tigers in the zoo. I have never seen these animals before. I was really happy to see them today.
我今天七點到學校。: 動物園裡有大象、馬和老虎，我從前沒有看過這些動物，今天看到了真的很開心。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: hlipitumuhlu cu a ku ’ahlingu, pakita hlamama ku.
I took a lot of pictures and showed them to my parents.
我今天七點到學校。: 我拍了很多照片，給爸爸媽媽看。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: mungahlʉ tumua mʉlʉvʉ hlamama ku mʉcʉkʉhlʉ.
Next time I will come with my parents.
我今天七點到學校。: 下次要跟爸爸媽媽一起來。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: taluvaʉlana ari kani’i, hlikisuamu ahlalua ahlaina musa Taitu takuliliungu tamalʉngalʉ.
This holiday, my sister and I went to Taitung to visit my uncle.
我今天七點到學校。: 這個假日，我和姊姊去台東拜訪叔叔。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: angahli a mu Taipakʉ mutatungusa likihli apuhlu musa Taitu.
We took the train from Taipei to Taitung.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們從台北搭火車去臺東。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: miungu cu Taitu, mulikihli tamalʉngalʉna mʉcʉkʉhlʉ utatungusa likihli ruavici ihlahlamu.
When we arrived in Taitung, my uncle drove to the station to pick us up.
我今天七點到學校。: 到了台東，叔叔開車來車站接我們。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: kuuasaihla aatʉ utatungusa likihlina saliaisa tamalʉngalʉna, mulikihli mu’alivatʉna ia miungu cu.
The station is not far from my uncle’s house, and it’s just a short drive away.
我今天七點到學校。: 車站離叔叔家沒有很遠，開車一下子就到了。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: liliunga saliaisa tamalʉngalʉ maru tam taisa taupangana ’ivingi, mʉlʉsʉamu likihli umarua sapahlʉ musa mahlukua taupangana ’ivingi.
There is a big ranch near my uncle’s house, and we rode bicycles to the ranch together.
我今天七點到學校。: 叔叔家附近有個很大的牧場，我們一起騎腳踏車到牧場。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: ma taupangana ’ivingi, ruavici tamalʉngalʉ amu pau ’ukui nua mutatungusa tarʉmʉcʉ kavahlʉ.
In the ranch, my uncle took us to feed the sheep and ride horses.
我今天七點到學校。: 在牧場，叔叔帶我們餵羊和騎馬。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: ruvana, kualʉsiamu musa mahlukua miararuma ikatumahlama uumau kuaruvaruvana.
In the evening, we went to the city to have dinner together.
我今天七點到學校。: 晚上，我們一起去市區吃飯。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: tamtumuhlu likihli a miararuma ikatumahlana, kuhlaisai mulikihliamu likihli umaru ’urai musa kaaiu.
There are a lot of cars in the city, so we go there by motorcycle.
我今天七點到學校。: 市區車子很多，所以我們騎摩托車去那裡。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: akuku miacikiri, pausu’ulu paralikapi cu, mutungusucuamu likihli kikucu musa.
When we were about to leave, we found that the motorcycle had been stolen, so we had to leave by bus.
我今天七點到學校。: 要離開的時候，發現摩托車被偷了，我們只好搭公車離開。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: puailicuamu Taipakʉ kani’i, paitatʉahlicui likihliisa umaru ’urai tamalʉngalʉna.
Now that we are back in Taipei, I don’t know if my uncle’s motorcycle has been found.
我今天七點到學校。: 現在我們回到台北了，不知道叔叔的摩托車找到了沒有。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: akuku maimi mana, maruaru amu rʉhlʉcʉ, mulavaʉ umaiiapʉ, ahlausuhlu cu a Takau, rianʉ ma ikatumahlana mangusipi.
When we were young, our family lived in Haising. After I started school, we moved to Kaohsiung and have been living in the city ever since.
我今天七點到學校。: 小時候我們家住在高中，上學以後，就搬到了高雄，一直在都市裡生活。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: ma cu ariataisa mulavaʉ, tiapili a ku ucani siatuturu a apulavaʉ vunguka isa cucumacu, macahli tarʉtatʉkʉhlʉ siaravacangʉ vunguka isa Taivangʉ cucumacu.
After I went to college, I took a course on aboriginal culture and learned that the aboriginal people in Taiwan have various and rich cultures.
我今天七點到學校。: 上了大學以後，我修了一堂關於原住民文化的課程，瞭解到臺灣原住民族有各式各樣豐富的文化。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: kuhlaisai, taluamacicia mamisa, ihlaku nua ahlalua hlahlusa puaili miararuma takuliliungu hlamama, hlatumua macacahlia tahlana vunguka takacicihli.
So this summer, my brother and I went back to our tribe to visit the elderly, hoping to understand the culture of our own ethnic group.
我今天七點到學校。: 因此，今年暑假時，我和哥哥回到部落訪問老人家，想要瞭解自己族群的文化。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: malʉhlʉ caihli cu a hlamamana, hla kitaʉia maraiahlʉ mana tamalʉngalʉ .
The old man is already eighty years old, but he still looks like a middle-aged man.
我今天七點到學校。: 老人家已經八十歲了，但是看起來還像中年人。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: pakisuahlai ku kana’ana tainini macahliisa kari, tam masivacangʉ kari Hla’alua, macahlia mʉmʉa masi kari sumukuhlu, kari puutu hla kari ’aumu.
I asked him which languages he knew, and he was fluent in Hla’alua, as well as Atayal, Hakka and Japanese.
我今天七點到學校。: 我問他會哪些語言，他的拉阿魯哇語說得很流利，也會說布農語、客家話和日本話。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: hlipakisuahlai ku kana’ana iniciki macahlia, usuanganaiau hlimusuturu kari ’aumu akuku mainimana, usumanʉisa ia cucu tahlana sumukuhlu ma ta’iaraisana tumahlaʉ pautuahlangʉisa cucupuutu, kuhlaisai matumuhlu a acahlisa kari.
I asked him to find out that he learned Japanese when he was a child, his wife is an Bunun, and he knows many Hakkas at work, so he can speak so many languages.
我今天七點到學校。: 我問他才知道，原來他小時候就學日本話，太太是布農族人，而他工作上認識許多客家人，所以他會說這麼多語言。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: akuku takuliliungu amu, hlimakakari hlamamana tam tumuhlu ausikan siaracahlia isa mʉrʉcʉka.
During our interview, the old man talked about a lot of traditional knowledge about hunting.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們訪談的時候，老人家談論了許多關於狩獵的傳統知識。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: maniki a mu kutuahlʉ rianʉ a timatakahlangʉ, hla maru a mu uruamia ’arivungua sipiakiatitipa, acahli maiatuhluhlu tumimahla.
Although we could’t fully understand it, we could record it on our cell phones and listen to it more.
我今天七點到學校。: 雖然我們沒有辦法完全聽懂，但是我們有用手機錄影，可以再仔細聆聽。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: akuku mainimana kuaku macahlia tahlana vunguka takacicihli, marinu aku mahlikua cucumacu.
When I was young, I didn’t understand the culture of my ethnic group, and I was a little embarrassed that I was an aborigine.
我今天七點到學校。: 小時候我不瞭解自己族群的文化，對於自己是原住民有點不好意思。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: matumuhlu siaracahlia rumahlaʉ tumacacurunucikia mara cucu tahlana Hla’alua, pakaritʉkʉhlʉcikia apausakisakiricikia.
The more I know, the more I feel that being a Hla’alua is unique and something to be proud of.
我今天七點到學校。: 瞭解愈多以後，愈覺得自己身為拉阿魯哇族人，是很獨特的，也很值得驕傲。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: kʉlʉpʉngʉ mahlipapu arinani, puaili cu a salia hlimilavaʉ hlahlusana.
My younger brother is going home this evening.
我今天七點到學校。: 今天傍晚，弟弟就要回家了。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: kisasuamu tamu ahlaina musa tai’a’ana tarʉtatʉatʉkʉhlʉ pu’a turukuka, pahlalalangʉ avavu kuaruvaruvana uvura hlimilavaʉ hlahlusa.
My grandma and I went to the market to buy chickens and prepared a delicious dinner for my younger brother.
我今天七點到學校。: 我和奶奶去市場買雞，準備煮好吃的晚餐給弟弟。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: micalivicu a mu i’a’ana hlatʉngʉ, maru a i’a’ana hlatʉngʉ matumuhlu mavacangʉ hlatʉngʉ.
We passed the vegetable stand, which had a lot of fresh green vegetables.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們經過了菜攤，菜攤有好多新鮮的青菜。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: hlipu’a a mu takungukungu, vukuri hla caipu matavuhliu.
We bought water spinach, yams and carrots.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們買了空心菜、山藥和胡蘿蔔。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: patʉkʉ cucui’a’ana masukiu’u amihla, “tam maami a pangʉtahlʉ hla ’ukuhlucu mimiliki ku. pu’akia mainimaini mau!”
The owner of the nearby fruit stand said: “My pineapples and peaches are very sweet. Buy some!”
我今天七點到學校。: 旁邊水果攤的老闆說:「我的鳳梨和桃子很甜。買一些吧!」

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: hlipu’a cu mu pangʉtahlʉ hla ’ukuhlucu mimiliki.
We bought pineapples and peaches.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們買了鳳梨和桃子。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: micalivi amu i’a’ana papa’a, amihla cucui’a’ana, “ngasa pu’au? taisa hla mavʉhlʉ a turukukana arinani, utulu hlimiungu ucani.”
We passed the meat stall, and the boss said, “What do you want to buy? Today's chickens are big and fat, and one is 300 NTD.”
我今天七點到學校。: 我們經過了肉攤，老闆說:「你要買什麼?今天的雞又大又肥，一隻300元。」

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: cacurunu tamuahlainana tamuucu langʉlangʉ, pakisuahlai cucui’a’ana acahli i mainimainikia kulangʉlangʉ.
Grandma thought it was too expensive and asked the boss if it could be cheaper.
我今天七點到學校。: 奶奶覺得太貴了，問老闆可不可以便宜一點。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: hla amihla cucui’a’ana tam kulangʉlangʉ, kucu tuahlʉ mariahlamasʉ.
But the boss said that it is already very cheap and cannot be reduced any further.
我今天七點到學校。: 但老闆說已經很便宜，不能再減了。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: patʉkʉ cucui’a’ana amihla, muara pu’a vutukuhlu ku, taisa hla kulangʉlangʉ vutukuhlu ku.
The boss next door said, come and buy my fish, my fish is big and cheap.
我今天七點到學校。: 隔壁的老闆說，來買我的魚，我的魚又大又便宜。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: mulavaʉ pu’a cu amu turukuka pu’a cu vutukuhlu mʉmʉa, puaili salia pahlacani tuu’una camai.
In the end we bought chicken and fish, and went home to cook a table of food.
我今天七點到學校。: 最後我們買了雞也買了魚，回家煮了一桌子的菜。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: rahlua cu a upapalu, sʉsʉma cu a langica.
After waiting for a long time, it was already dark.
我今天七點到學校。: 等了好久，天已經黑了。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: pata’arivungua hlimilavaʉ hlahlusa puaili amihla, umarilʉmʉlʉmʉ kutuahlicu taluavaʉlʉ, mungahlʉ taluavaʉlana ari iniciki puaili.
The younger brother called back and said that the army suddenly couldn't take a vacation and would not be back until the next Sunday.
我今天七點到學校。: 弟弟打電話回來說，軍隊突然不能放假了，要下一個禮拜日才回來。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: amihla tamu ahlainana hliavavucu a matumuhlu, pakuvavau rianʉ a cucu’u kualʉsikia uumu!
Grandma said that she has cooked so much, so let's eat together!
我今天七點到學校。: 奶奶說已經煮了這麼多，叫大家一起來吃吧!

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: makuakuamu muricucu kualʉsʉ uumu kuavacangʉ siacalaia kuaruvaruvana.
We invited friends and family to have a great dinner together.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們邀請了親朋好友，一起來享用豐盛的晚餐。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: maru cacihli laʉlaʉviku pia Caʉpʉisana, karʉkʉhlʉ kana’ana asapu mahlava cacalaisa.
I have a classmate named Caʉpʉna, he often forgets to bring things.
我今天七點到學校。: 我有一個同學叫Caʉpʉna，他常常忘記帶東西。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: akuku umaiaiapʉ, umahlikua kana’ana laʉlaʉvʉisa umuhli siasuhlatʉ, siasamusu ahla siakatʉka.
During class, he borrowed pencils, erasers or notebooks from his classmates.
我今天七點到學校。: 上課的時候，他跟同學借鉛筆、橡皮擦或是筆記本。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: mungahlʉ, mupapuahlʉ, mutatuluhlu, rianʉ mʉmʉa umauhlisana.
Once, twice, three times, everyone would lend him something.
我今天七點到學校。: 一次、兩次、三次，大家會借東西給他。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: maru a takuliacʉ isa, karʉkʉhlʉ umuhli kua apuaili.
But he has a bad habit of often borrowing things but not returning them.
我今天七點到學校。: 但是他有個壞習慣，經常借了東西卻不還。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: ulavaisa riani cu kupauhli isana.
In the end, no one wanted to borrow anything from him.
我今天七點到學校。: 最後大家都不想借他東西了。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: maru ucani ari, kiʉlʉsia amu musa mutatahluvatʉ.
One day, we all went on an outing together.
我今天七點到學校。: 有一天，我們大家一起去郊遊。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: sala aisa, hlatumua Caʉpʉna musa tatiahla, hlaa asapu kana’ana mahlava sipiarisi.
On the way, Caʉpʉna wanted to go to the bathroom, but he forgot to bring toilet paper.
我今天七點到學校。: 路途中，Caʉpʉna想上廁所，但他忘記帶衛生紙。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: umahlikua laʉlaʉvʉisa kana’ana umuhli sipiarisi, ahli’aimau rianʉ mʉmʉa masiaili amihla, kuaku mahlava mʉmʉa.
He borrowed toilet paper from his classmates, but everyone told him that I didn’t bring them either.
我今天七點到學校。: 他跟同學借衛生紙，可是大家都回他說，我也沒有帶耶。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: mutʉngʉtʉngʉ tumangi, umarucarucakʉ kana’ana amihla, “tiaramu mʉmʉa kupauhli ihlaku sipiarisi.”
Caʉpʉna burst into tears. He said angrily, why don’t everyone lend me toilet paper!
我今天七點到學校。: Caʉpʉna急的哭了出來。他生氣的說：「為什麼大家都不借我衛生紙。」

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: kihlamuhlamu laʉlaʉvʉisa kana’ana, ta’iaraisaka kuu takacicihli mahlava, hla hliumuhli kuapuaili pahlivinga, ihlau kuu apuaili.
The classmate told him, because you didn’t bring it yourself, and you wouldn’t return the things lent to you!
我今天七點到學校。: 同學告訴他，因為你都不自己帶，而且借給你的東西，你都不會還!

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: umaiiapʉ matata, mualualu Caʉpʉna mahlukua ariatʉkʉrana, hliuhliana Caʉpʉna sapialaliacu mʉmʉa.
The next day at school, Caʉpʉna arrived at school early and returned everything he had borrowed from his classmates.
我今天七點到學校。: 隔天上學，Caʉpʉna很早就到學校了，Caʉpʉna把跟同學借的東西都還給同學們。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: umahlikua laʉlaʉvʉisa kana’ana akuainita’ai, hla amihla cucuaari tʉtʉrʉaku takacicihli mahlava pahlivinga, sia’ʉ’ʉraisamana mʉmʉa pauhli ihlaku pahlivinga.
Caʉpʉna apologized to the students and said that he would definitely bring his own things in the future, and thanked the classmates for their willingness to lend him things before.
我今天七點到學校。: Caʉpʉna向同學們道歉，並說他以後一定會自己帶東西，也謝謝同學們之前願意借他東西。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: amaku ia miararuma cucu mʉrʉcʉka.
My dad is a hunter of the tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的爸爸是部落的獵人。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: akuku mainimana, musa ama’a nua tamalʉngalʉ vuvulunga ruvana, mahlava hlitakʉ hla hlahlitu.
When I was little, my dad and uncle would go out at night with hunting knives and guns.
我今天七點到學校。: 我小的時候，爸爸和叔叔在晚上出門，帶著獵刀和獵槍。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: sihlangʉ, mahlava hlipanaisa hlakana’ana kuli’i puaili.
At daybreak, they returned with their prey.
我今天七點到學校。: 天亮時，他們就會帶著獵到的獵物回來。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: marumaru maci alʉmʉhlʉ, marumaru maci laarʉ, apahlapa maru hlatarʉaʉ mʉmʉa.
Sometimes it was a boar, sometimes a flying squirrel, and occasionally a pheasant.
我今天七點到學校。: 有時候是山豬、有時候是飛鼠，偶爾也會有雉雞。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: maru kana’ana miararuma pususua papa’a, uvara cucutahlana siacalai.
They would divide the prey at the entrance of the village and share it with the tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 他們會在村口將獵物分好，分享給族人。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: apiarasʉ a ku ama’ana, tumua mʉlʉvʉ ama’ana musa mʉrʉcʉka.
Every time I quarreled with my father, I wanted to go hunting with my father.
我今天七點到學校。: 我每次都會吵著爸爸，要跟著爸爸去打獵。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: amihla ama’ana macu a ku arataisa iniciki ruavici ihlaku musa.
Dad said that he would take me with me when I grew up.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸說等我長大了他再帶我一起去。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: hlahlahlusa miararuma macahlia mʉmʉa maruamia ringai matiasangalʉ kuli’i, macahlia hlakana’ana tumamahlʉngʉ tilu hla ’acʉvʉ.
The men of the tribe also trap their prey, making lasso traps and rock traps.
我今天七點到學校。: 部落的男人也會用陷阱抓獵物，他們會製作套索陷阱和石壓式陷阱。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: tam macahlia amaku tumamahlʉngʉ tilu, amihla ama’ana, kani’ina maruamia matiasangalʉ hlatarʉaʉ, puamahlʉmahlʉngʉ amu hlikiramia kuli’i, ikaku tatahlʉ kuli’i a ringai.
My dad is very good at making lasso traps. Dad said that this is used to catch pheasants. We have to carefully observe the footprints of the prey, and the traps should be placed on the path of the prey.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的爸爸很會製作套索陷阱，爸爸說，這是用來捕抓雉雞的，我們要仔細觀察獵物的腳印，陷阱要放在獵物走的路上。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: marapihli tuahlʉ makulai mʉlʉvʉ hlamama muasa mʉrʉcʉka, ariari a ku takutatahlamʉ tumahlʉngʉ ringai, macuisa makulai ringai ku maritʉahlʉ kuli’i.
In order to go hunting with adults as soon as possible, I practiced making traps every day, and soon my traps can really catch prey.
我今天七點到學校。: 為了可以趕快和大人一起去打獵，我每天練習製作陷阱，很快地我的陷阱就真的可以抓到獵物了。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: kumita ama’a rumahlaʉ hliulavalava cu ku cucuaari mʉrʉcʉka.
Dad saw it and told me that I will be a very good hunter in the future.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸看到後對我說我以後一定很會打獵。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: arataisa cu a ku kani’i, mataraingi a ku vuuru hla ripasʉ, mʉlʉvʉ ama’a musa mʉrʉcʉka.
Now that I have grown up, I carry my bow and arrows and go hunting with my father.
我今天七點到學校。: 現在我長大了，我背起我的弓和箭矢，跟著爸爸一起去打獵。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: macu a puaili miararuma rumahlaʉ hlipana kuli’i pupusuaisana cucutahlana.
When returning to the village, share the hunted prey with the tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 回村時將獵到的獵物和族人們分享。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: amihla ama’ana, sia’ʉ’ʉraisa ’ihlacu langica, uvura ihlata matumuhlu kuli’i.
Dad said, we want to thank the ancestors for their blessings, so that we have a lot of prey to harvest.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸說，我們要感謝祖靈賜福，讓我們有很多獵物收穫。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: pasaʉrʉkʉcicuaku maivʉvʉrʉnga akuisa musa umiiapʉ.
I was late for school this morning.
我今天七點到學校。: 我早上上學遲到了。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: akuisa musa ariatʉkʉrana rumahlaʉ , asapucuaku mahlava luvucu.
When I was going to school, I forgot to bring my backpack.
我今天七點到學校。: 去學校的時候，我忘了帶書包。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: kuaku ahlava rianʉ pahlivinga.
I didn't bring anything with me.
我今天七點到學校。: 我什麼東西都沒有帶。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: akuisa umaiaiapʉ rumahlaʉ, pulʉsʉaku laʉlaʉvʉ kumakita suhlatʉ.
During class, I and my classmates read the textbook together.
我今天七點到學校。: 上課的時候，我和同學一起看課本。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: akuisa kiatarari rumahlaʉ, pauhli a laʉlaʉvʉ ihlakua siasuhlatʉ hla siasamusu.
During the exam, a classmate lent me a pen and an eraser.
我今天七點到學校。: 考試的時候，同學借我筆和橡皮擦。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: kihlamuhlamua pakiaturua ihlakua, “pasakulaikiia umacʉka mungahlangahla, kucikiia pasaʉrʉkʉcʉ!”
The teacher told me, Wake up earlier next time and don't be late again!""
我今天七點到學校。: 老師跟我說：「下次早點起床，不要再遲到了!」

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: ngahla isa tukucu ku ia Mai, kana’ana ia ihlaisa mʉmʉa mamaini Hla’alua.
My good friend’s name is Mai, and he is also an Hla’alua child.
我今天七點到學校。: 我的好朋友叫Mai，他也是拉阿魯哇族的小孩。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: ma amu Rʉhlʉcʉ pasaʉlʉsʉ umiiapʉ.
We study together in the Rʉhlʉcʉ tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們一起在Rʉhlʉcʉ部落讀書。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: karʉkʉhlʉ amu pasaʉlʉsʉ tumimahla hlamama kisuahlahlama, rianʉamu tam macahlia masi kari Hla’alua.
We often listen to the elders telling stories together, and we both can speak the Hla’alua proficiently.
我今天七點到學校。: 我們常常一起聽耆老說故事，我們都很會說拉阿魯哇語。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: tam langicaku tam mavʉhlʉ aku mʉmʉa, tam mikasekase hla tam mirihlia Mai.
I am tall and overweight, while Mai is short and thin.
我今天七點到學校。: 我很高也很胖，Mai很矮也很瘦。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: tam kuatitipa Mai, tam marumukua cucu’u mʉmʉa kana’ana.
Mai is very energetic, and everyone likes him a lot.
我今天七點到學校。: Mai很有活力，大家都很喜歡他。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: arinani ia sikurarau kuatitipa ariatʉkʉrana, hlikuraraucua ariatʉkʉrana matumuhlua sitarisia.
Today was the school's sports day, and the school organized many competitions.
我今天七點到學校。: 今天是學校的運動會，學校舉辦了許多競賽。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: maarua rʉkʉcʉ siakilia, pisuvatʉrʉ taʉhlʉkai, mitahlahlʉ, musurauvu hla kuurivuuru.
There were tug of war, soccer, running, dancing, and archery.
我今天七點到學校。: 有拔河、足球、跑步、跳舞和射箭。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: tarisia ku mitahlahlʉ.
I participated in the running competition.
我今天七點到學校。: 我比賽跑步。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: akuku mitahlahlʉ rumahlaʉ, milakupu cu aku, murukipuhlu cara’ʉ lasahlʉ.
When I was running, I fell down, and my knees were bleeding.
我今天七點到學校。: 當我跑步的時候，我跌倒了，膝蓋流了很多血。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: ucaniika akuku umacʉka rumahlaʉ, tapihlusuhlusu tapikakua ahliacuvungu.
But I stood up and continued running forward.
我今天七點到學校。: 但我站起來，繼續向前跑。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: akuku miungu ualava ia masasangarʉa cucu’u mʉmʉa.
Everyone was happy when I reached the finish line.
我今天七點到學校。: 我到終點時所有人都很開心。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: manikia ku atʉahlʉ hlikicualu, ucaanika masasangarʉa ku, ta’iaraisaka pasalipingicuaku sitarisia.
Although I didn't get first place, I'm glad because I completed the race.
我今天七點到學校。: 雖然沒有獲得第一名，但我很高興，因為我完成了比賽。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: kisasuaku ama’a kiira musa takuliliungu tamalʉngalʉ.
Yesterday, my father and I visited my uncle.
我今天七點到學校。: 昨天我和爸爸去拜訪我的叔叔。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: marahlivuhlivu a sapahlʉisa tamalʉngalʉna.
My uncle injured his foot.
我今天七點到學校。: 叔叔的腳受傷了。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: kihlamuhlamu a kana’ana ihlahlamu. milaluihli a hlialuvuna.
He told us that there was a hole in the roof of his house.
我今天七點到學校。: 他告訴我們，房子的屋頂破了一個洞。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: matiangahlangahla a kana’ana rumahlaʉ, angahli hlialuvu mutupiakʉ.
He fell off the roof while repairing it.
我今天七點到學校。: 他在修理屋頂時，從屋頂摔下來了。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: hlimahlava a ama’ana papakalavungu hla saviki uvura tamalʉngalʉ.
My father brought beef and betel nuts for my uncle.
我今天七點到學校。: 爸爸帶了牛肉和檳榔給叔叔。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: maku tatara nua tamalʉngalʉna arupakakari, matumuhlu a hlikihlahlamuisa kana’ana kisuahlahlama.
My uncle and I chatted in the room, and he shared many stories.
我今天七點到學校。: 我和叔叔在房間裡聊天，他分享了很多故事。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: miacikiriaku mualualu rumahlaʉ, puvahli a tamalʉngalʉ ihlaku mahlulangicacu, mataingalʉ aramasalangʉsangicu mʉmʉa.
Before I left, my uncle praised me for growing taller and becoming more handsome.
我今天七點到學校。: 我要離開前，叔叔誇我長高了，也變得更帥氣了。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: amihla ihlaku, “maci aramahlʉngicu a sapahlʉ tamalʉngalʉna ia, muacʉkʉhlʉkia saliahlamu takuliliungu.”
I said, When your foot gets better
我今天七點到學校。: come to our house next time and visit us.""
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/35629/5: 我說：「等叔叔腳好了，下次也來我們家玩。」

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: ma usua hlimiaili mapuahlʉ usua caihli, makarikari a siihuna umahlikua cucumacu pakipuhlu cukahlangʉ cucu’una palungu ngahla.
In 2022, the government announced that indigenous identification cards can include tribal names separately.
我今天七點到學校。: 在2022年，政府召開了原住民身分證可單列族名的會議。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: rahlua pakisusuahlai umahlikua siihu makikini pakipuhlu cukahlangʉ cucu’u palungu ngahlana alamuru Hlakuta’i savangʉana.
I interviewed Noami Kulas, a young tribal member who has long been advocating for the inclusion of tribal names on identification cards.
我今天七點到學校。: 我訪問了長期向政府爭取身分證「單列族名」的部落青年Hlakuta’i savangʉana。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: hlipitʉtʉrʉaku kana’ana kani’i taluavaʉlana musa saliaisa kana’ana pakisuahlai.
We had arranged to visit his home this holiday for the interview.
我今天七點到學校。: 我和他約定好這個假日到他家訪問他。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: ma pakisusuahlai pasamiana, kihlamuhlamu a kana’ana ihlaku hliangahlahlana pahlumiamia ngahlaisa, ruavici ihlaku mʉmʉa pautuahlangi cucusaliaisa hla miararumaisa.
During the interview, he introduced to me the origin of his name and also introduced me to his family and tribe.
我今天七點到學校。: 在訪問的過程中，他向我介紹了他的名字的由來，也帶我認識了他的家人、他的部落。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: pakisuahlaiaku kana’ana tiaraisa maisukasʉ puliuhlu palungu ngahla, ku i avacangʉ sitakuamia kiariarina?
I asked him why he insisted on changing his name. Wasn't the old registration method sufficient?
我今天七點到學校。: 我問他為什麼堅持要改名，舊的登記方式不好嗎?

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: umalivalʉ a kana’ana ihlaku, ta’iaraisaka suhlatʉ hlakʉsaiana ku macuisa sipiaʉngʉca ngahlaisa, maarumana usumanʉ pia kana’ana 「撒先生」, kuhlaisai. tam pi sitahliasulua.
He told me that using Chinese characters could not accurately convey his name, and others would still call him Na Xian Sheng
我今天七點到學校。: which resulted in many jokes being made.
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/35629/5: 他對我說，因為用中文字並不能準確的傳達他的名字，其他人還會叫他「撒先生」，也因此鬧出不少笑話。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: amihla Hlakuta’i savangʉana, siasuhlatʉ cucumacu ngahlana ia, ihlaisa macuisa sipiangʉngʉca ngahlahlamu, ngahlaku ia hlaka tahlanahlamu, pihlingihlamu, cukahlangʉhlamu cucu’u, ahliki’aiia tumahlaʉ cucutahlana tuahlʉ maitʉahlʉ palungu ngahla takacicihli.
Noami Kulas said, The names written in indigenous languages are our true names. My name represents our ethnic group
我今天七點到學校。: our family
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/35629/5: our identity. I hope more fellow tribespeople can reclaim their own names.""
column5: Hlakuta’i savangʉana說：「原住民語書寫的名字才是我們真正的名字。我的名字代表了我們的族群、我們的家族、我們的身分，希望能有更多族人找到自己的名字。」

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: kisasuaku tamu’u ahlaina kiira musa parana i’a’ana, hlimahlava a tamu’u ahlainana matumuhlu hlatʉngʉ hlitakacicihlisa lʉmʉmʉkʉ, hlitumamahlʉngʉ mʉmʉa anʉanʉaisa cucumacu panaisa cucu’u.
Yesterday, I went to the market with my grandmother to set up a stall. My grandmother brought a lot of vegetables that she grew herself and also prepared indigenous cuisine for everyone.
我今天七點到學校。: 昨天我跟奶奶去市集擺攤，奶奶帶了許多自己種的蔬菜去，也製作了原住民美食給大家。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: tam marumuku a cucu’u i’a’anaisa tamu’u ahlaina, tumahlaʉ a cucu’u pu’a samʉsamʉ hla kʉrʉsa marʉmʉ, tumahlaʉ a cucu’u mʉcʉkʉhlʉ kutahlamʉ hliavavaisa camai.
Everyone loved my grandmother's stall. Many people bought the chilis and African eggplants, and many people came to taste the dishes she cooked.
我今天七點到學校。: 大家很喜歡奶奶的攤位，辣椒和車輪茄很多人買，許多人來品嘗她煮的菜餚。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: tam sa’au a hliavavaisa taliri hla tangusuhlu, maarumana hlipahlatarua papaalʉmʉhlʉ hlipatakua imuu, pahluisa mariakuanʉ tumahlaʉ cucu’u, rianʉ a cucu’u mʉcʉkʉhlʉ i’a’anahlamu patavʉhlʉrʉ.
The ferns and sticky rice she cooked were delicious, as well as the braised pork with maqaw pepper and wild boar meat. The flavors attracted many customers, and everyone lined up at our stall.
我今天七點到學校。: 她煮的蕨菜和糯米飯非常好吃，還有用山豬肉煮的馬告滷肉，味道吸引了很多客人，大家都來我們攤位排隊。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: avavuavu a tamu’una rumahlaʉ, maku patʉkʉ maritara’ʉhla cucu’u, maku patʉkʉ makuvau. “kani’i hlatʉngʉna rianʉ hlitakacicihla lʉmʉmʉkʉ, hlitakacicihli tumangura, pasakulai mʉcʉkʉhlʉ pu’a.”
While my grandmother was cooking, I was on the side attracting customers. I shouted, The vegetables are self-grown
我今天七點到學校。: all-natural and organic! Come and buy now!""
https://web.klokah.tw/text/sound/35629/5: 奶奶煮東西的時候，我在旁邊招攬客人。我在一旁大喊著：「蔬菜都是自己種的，天然有機，趕快來買喔!」

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: makulai a i’a’ahlamu pukucuaʉ, amihla tamu’u ahlainana, “ta’iaraisaka hlapataliliviu.”
Our goods sold out quickly, and my grandmother said, It's all thanks to your help.""
我今天七點到學校。: 我們的東西很快就賣完了，奶奶說：「都是因為有你的幫忙。」

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: kani’i sikurarauna matumuhlu a hliusuturuaku cacalaisa hlitakacicihli tumangura hla siaana siaracahlia cucumacu, hlaa hlipautuhluhlu takualangʉlangʉ i’a’a.
Through this event, I learned about indigenous plants and food and experienced the hard work of running a stall.
我今天七點到學校。: 這個活動，我學到了有關原住民植物和食品的知識，並且體驗到了擺攤的辛苦。

upitu pakiaturua musa ku ariatʉkʉrana ar: pausu’uluaku arumukaisa tamu’una anʉanʉa mairahlu cucumacu, tacacurunaaku tam puavahli hla malitʉnʉlʉ.
Seeing my grandmother's passion for traditional food, I feel very proud and honored.
我今天七點到學校。: 看到了奶奶對傳統食物的熱愛，我感到非常驕傲和榮幸。
